courses.subject: OBGY
courses.title: Guided Studies

meetings.instructor:
Miss TAM Wing Ki, 
Professor LEUNG Tak Yeung

Professor DONG Zirui, 
Professor LEUNG Tak Yeung

courses.description: To attend seminars and workshops and to perform assignments for the purposes of increasing knowledge of the research area and improving experimental design and data analysis.
courses.enrollment_requirement: For students in MPhil Obstetrics and Gynaecology
courses.learning_outcomes: The programme is research-oriented.  Students should inform themselves about the field of knowledge relevant to the topic of their projects.  Students should show ability to formulate research questions, construct sound study hypothesis and use appropriate methodology for their research study.
courses.course_syllabus: The topics will be provided by individual supervisor(s).
courses.feedback_evaluation: Graduate Survey for Reseach Postgraduate Programme.
courses.required_readings: Students should generate a list of literature by own study.

courses.subject: OBGY
courses.title: Seminar

meetings.instructor:
Professor DONG Zirui, 
Professor LEUNG Tak Yeung

courses.description: To present a seminar summarizing research work performed in the previous term/year.
courses.enrollment_requirement: For students in MPhil Obstetrics and Gynaecology
courses.learning_outcomes: The programme is research-oriented.  Students should inform themselves about the fields of knowledge relevant to the topic of their projects.  Students will be required to give at least 2 graduate seminars to report their study progress within their normal study period and summarize their study before graduation.
courses.course_syllabus: The topics will be provided by individual supervisor(s).
courses.feedback_evaluation: Graduate Survey for Reseach Postgraduate Programme.
courses.required_readings: Students should generate a list of literature by own study.

courses.subject: OBGY
courses.title: Research

meetings.instructor:
Miss TAM Wing Ki, 
Professor WANG Chi Chiu

Professor DONG Zirui, 
Professor LEUNG Tak Yeung

courses.description: To perform research work related to thesis topic under direction of supervisor.
courses.enrollment_requirement: For students in MPhil Obstetrics and Gynaecology
courses.learning_outcomes: The programme is research-oriented.  Students should show ability to work and finish the research study under supervision.  Students will be required to submit their thesis and pass an oral examination for graduation.
courses.course_syllabus: The topics will be provided by individual supervisor(s).
courses.feedback_evaluation: Graduate Survey for Reseach Postgraduate Programme.
courses.required_readings: Students should generate a list of literature by own study.
